entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:21 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:21 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
